mapper.select: SELECT problem_id, due_time, title, status FROM ( SELECT h.question_id AS problem_id, h.due_time, q.title, CASE WHEN MAX(CASE WHEN CAST(s.state AS UNSIGNED) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 THEN 'passed' WHEN MAX(CASE WHEN CAST(s.state AS UNSIGNED) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 THEN 'failed' ELSE 'not tried' END AS status, @rn := IF(@prev_question_id = h.question_id, @rn + 1, 1) AS rn, @prev_question_id := h.question_id FROM (SELECT @rn := 0, @prev_question_id := NULL) vars, homework h LEFT JOIN question q ON h.question_id = q.id LEFT JOIN submission s ON h.question_id = s.question_id AND s.user_id = #{studentId} AND s.submit_time < h.due_time WHERE h.class_id = #{classId} GROUP BY h.question_id, h.due_time, q.title ORDER BY h.question_id, h.due_time ASC ) t WHERE rn = 1;
